title: U.S. health and fitness apps download share by subcategory 2022 | Statista
author: L Ceci; Dec 5
description: Between January and October 2022, workout and fitness apps were the most downloaded health and fitness app subcategories in the United States, with a market share of 23.6 percent.
cleaned_text: U.S. download share of health and fitness apps 2022, by subcategory [Between January and October 2022, workout and fitness apps were the most downloaded health and fitness app subcategories in the United States, with a market share of 23.6 percent. Weight loss apps followed, with approximately 14 percent of market share in the category. Women's health reported a download share of around four percent in the examined period among
